comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: cenantua.wordpress.com/web-pages-within-my-blog/biographi... says: PRESSGRAVES, William H.: b. circa 1845 Virginia (s/o John Henry Presgraves & Mary Jane Stover). Census Data: 1850: House #819; 1860: Hope Mills Dist. 4; 1870: Hope Mills Dist. – Laborer. Hope Mills appears to be in Luray. So that and the date of birth match the note in the catalog record. But the mother's name does not match. wc.rootsweb.ancestry.com/cgi-bin/igm.cgi?op=GET&db=kg... gives Mary Jane Fleming as his mother's name and 1846 as date of birth. His mother died in 1851. No further details on William.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks for your research, swanq.  We can definitely fill in the mother's first name the next time we update the record.
